document.description: Examples of the lemma rip from the MASC project for FN annotation
document.name: rip

sentence.text: In the scene , Mo 's dress is ripped by a drunken admirer .
During these first scuffles the blue civil rights banner was seized and ripped by the police .
She was stitching the holes Rosie had managed to rip in the seat of his pants in the few seconds they were in her possession .
The second cell ( 82c ) contains a moaning , naked Orc chained down on a bed of nails which rip the boil-infested flesh on his back .
Athelstan carefully ripped the canvas open with the small knife he always carried .
He remembered her ripping it the day she 'd taken him to see the hens for the first time .
She knew if she forced it she would rip it .
She took a deep breath and ripped the envelope open swiftly -- Well , there was only one way to find out .
Then she remembered her night-gown was torn down the front where Faith Caskie had ripped it .
Youngman shouted : ` You have ripped my jacket .
He ripped open one of the little silver foil packets and handed her the lubricated ring of rubber .
` One of them ripped my blouse .
They ripped open the jugular vein , releasing an appalling rush of blood .
The blast ripped a hole in the side of the Cole , killing 17 members of the ship 's crew and wounding at least 40 .
When he last went into the hospital , my father was still wearing an old pair of gray wool slacks with a sewed - up hole in them from where my dog ripped them -- 15 years ago .
